title: Remote and Face-to-Face Facilitated Simulation-Based Training Program: Enhancing Social Situational Response Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social issues and practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended simulation training using an LMS (Learning Management System) in a BYOD environment, centered on social conflict resolution and communication scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate response strategies in four types of social conflict simulations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish behavior improvement plans reflecting peer feedback and instructor evaluations at least three times each in RF-SBT and LF-SBT environments.
Within 72 hours after simulation training, learners can propose two or more social problem-solving procedures applicable to real work environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
